scripts.install: prebuild-install.cmd -r napi -t 4 -a x64 || prebuild-install -r napi -t 4 -a x64
scripts.devbuild: prebuild.cmd -r napi -t 4 -a x64 --backend cmake-js || prebuild -r napi -t 4 -a x64 --backend cmake-js
scripts.prebuild: prebuild.cmd -r napi -t 4 -a x64 --prepack codesign --backend cmake-js || prebuild -r napi -t 4 -a x64 --prepack codesign --backend cmake-js
